queryParameters.name: limit
queryParameters.description: Maximum number of records to return. (10 by default).

queryParameters.name: offset
queryParameters.description: Number of records to be skipped.

queryParameters.name: active
queryParameters.description: Retrieves records based on the given value ie.,true/false.

queryParameters.name: active
queryParameters.description: Retrieves records based on given value ie.,True / false.

queryParameters.name: code
queryParameters.description: Retrieves records based on the given code value.

queryParameters.name: description
queryParameters.description: Retrieves the records based on the given description.

queryParameters.name: active
queryParameters.description: Retrieves records based on the given value ie.,True / false.

pathParameters.name: type_name
pathParameters.description: Type_names are intended for filtering Vendors, separated by ENUMs as “type” field.

queryParameters.name: status
queryParameters.description: Retrieves the records based on the given status value ie., 0 (pending), 1 (approved), 2 (denied), 3 (full purchased), 4 (cancelled), 5 (full received).

queryParameters.name: date
queryParameters.description: Retrieves the records based on Created date.

queryParameters.name: dateRequired
queryParameters.description: Retrieves the records based on Required date.

queryParameters.name: dateModified
queryParameters.description: Retrieves the records based on Last modified date.

queryParameters.name: totalPrice
queryParameters.description: Retrieves the records based on Total order price.

queryParameters.name: status
queryParameters.description: Retrieves the records based on the given status value ie., pending_approval, approval_denied,pending_purchase, purchase_rejected, purchased,pending_receive, partial_received, full_received

endpoints.name: Get Purchase Orders by Role & Status

pathParameters.name: Role
pathParameters.description: Purchase order type either purchased or receivable.

queryParameters.name: counts
queryParameters.description: Returns key “counts” in “metadata” with total count of all statuses.

endpoints.name: Get Purchase Order by ID (with items)

queryParameters.name: status
queryParameters.description: Status of the expense report ex:draft, pending, approved, denied, paid.

queryParameters.name: status
queryParameters.description: Status of the expense report ex:draft, pending, approved, denied, paid.

queryParameters.name: account
queryParameters.description: ID of Account (budget of Dept + Acct Code).

queryParameters.name: collection
queryParameters.description: Choices on billable items (all, accrual, order,order-archived, expense, expense-archived).

queryParameters.name: received_on_0
queryParameters.description: Filters items received after this date,format is yyyy-mm-dd

queryParameters.name: received_on_1
queryParameters.description: Filters items received before this date,format is yyyy-mm-dd

queryParameters.name: requester
queryParameters.description: ID of Expense or OrderItem requester.

queryParameters.name: location
queryParameters.description: ID of location of any cost allocation.

queryParameters.name: search
queryParameters.description: Search for items by vendor, sku, or description.

queryParameters.name: search_in
queryParameters.description: Search for items under specific fields.

queryParameters.name: status
queryParameters.description: Status of the bill ex: All, draft, confirmed, approved, denied, withdrawn,paid, approved-paid, denied-withdrawn, archived,pending-approval.
